text: The Jiadhol River is a river in India. It starts fron Arunachal Pradesh and flows through Dhemaji district. It finally meets the Subansiri river. It takes the name of Kumotiya River in Gogamukh. Jiadhol is also known as "Sorrow of Dhemaji" because of the damage it causes by annual floods. Category:Rivers of India
title: Jiadhal River
